indicator_name: Amount of United States dollars committed to public-private and civil society partnerships
target_name: Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships, building on the experience and resourcing strategies of partnerships

other_info: This, or part of this, indicator is awaiting the development of internationally established methodology and standards (classified by the UN as tier 3).
